newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Albuquerque, N.M.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Albuquerque, N.M.

text.p: NOTICE OF INTENTION TO SELL BONDS
Consisting of $44,620,000 General Purpose Bonds, Series
NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that the City of Albuquerque, New Mexico on
will receive unconditional bids in a sealed envelope marked Proposal for City of Albuquerque General Obligation
Bonds'' until the hour of 11:00 o'clock a.m., Mountain Standard Time, in the City Clerk's Office,

Albuquerque/Bernalillo County Government Center, One Civic Plaza, N.W., 11th FLoor, Albuquerque, New Mexico 87102 for the purchase of all, but not less than all, of the City's General Obligation Bonds, Series 1997 (the Bonds'') to be issued in two series but sold as one issue in an aggregate principal amount of $51,320,000. The opening of bids may be postponed by the City until 11:00 o'clock a.m., Mountain Standard Time, on January 22, 1997by publishing notice thereof in Munifacts prior to 2:00 P.M., local time in the City of New York, New York, on January 3, 1997. A good faith deposit in the form of a certified or cashier's check in the amount of $1,026,400 payable to the order of the Treasurer, City of Albuquerque'', is required.

NOTICE IS ALSO GIVEN that the Bonds will be offered subject to the terms and conditions of the Official Notice of Bond Sale, dated December 16, 1996. Copies of the Official Notice of Bond Sale and of a Preliminary Official Statement relating to the Bonds will be furnished upon
request made to Perry M. Baird, Debt Manager, City
Treasurer's Office, City of Albuquerque, P.O. Box 1293, Albuquerque, NM 87103, telephone (505) 768-3309, fax (505) 768-3447.
